security-attribute
******************


Description
===========

A security attribute that belongs to a specific security attribute
namespace. Security attributes must be created in a tenancy before a
user can apply them to resources. For more information, see Managing
Security Attributes.

**Warning:** Oracle recommends that you avoid using any confidential
information when you supply string values using the API.


Available Commands
==================

* bulk-delete

* bulk-edit

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* update
